Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, innovation, and exclusivity. I am extending to you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is not only a testament to our commitment to making such high-quality products accessible but also a recognition of your discerning taste and impeccable standards. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
